HL7 FHIR® UK Core Implementation Guide - December 2019. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

  • Narrative Content
  • XML
  • JSON

XML Format: CodeSystem-UKCore-ListWarningCode

Download Raw xml 


<CodeSystem xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="UKCore-ListWarningCode"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>UK Core List Warning Code</h2><div><p>A CodeSystem to identify the reason a list may be incomplete.</p>
</div><p><b>Copyright Statement:</b> Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital</p><p>This code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-ListWarningCode defines the following codes:</p><table class="codes"><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap"><b>Code</b></td><td><b>Display</b></td><td><b>Definition</b></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">confidential-items<a name="UKCore-ListWarningCode-confidential-items"> </a></td><td>Confidential Items</td><td>Items excluded due to confidentiality and/or patient preferences.</td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">data-in-transit<a name="UKCore-ListWarningCode-data-in-transit"> </a></td><td>Data in Transit</td><td>Patient record transfer from previous GP practice not yet complete; any information recorded before dd-mmm-yyyy has been excluded.</td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">data-awaiting-filing<a name="UKCore-ListWarningCode-data-awaiting-filing"> </a></td><td>Data Awaiting Filing</td><td>Patient data may be incomplete as there is data supplied by a third party awaiting review before becoming available.</td></tr></table></div>
  </text>
  <url value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-ListWarningCode"/>
  <version value="1.0.0"/>
  <name value="UKCoreListWarningCode"/>
  <title value="UK Core List Warning Code"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <date value="2019-11-04T00:00:00+00:00"/>
  <publisher value="NHS Digital"/>
  <contact>
    <name value="Interoperability Team"/>
    <telecom>
      <system value="email"/>
      <value value="interoperabilityteam@nhs.net"/>
      <use value="work"/>
    </telecom>
  </contact>
  <description
               value="A CodeSystem to identify the reason a list may be incomplete."/>
  <copyright value="Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital"/>
  <caseSensitive value="true"/>
  <content value="complete"/>
  <concept>
    <code value="confidential-items"/>
    <display value="Confidential Items"/>
    <definition
                value="Items excluded due to confidentiality and/or patient preferences."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="data-in-transit"/>
    <display value="Data in Transit"/>
    <definition
                value="Patient record transfer from previous GP practice not yet complete; any information recorded before dd-mmm-yyyy has been excluded."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="data-awaiting-filing"/>
    <display value="Data Awaiting Filing"/>
    <definition
                value="Patient data may be incomplete as there is data supplied by a third party awaiting review before becoming available."/>
  </concept>
</CodeSystem>

Published by NHS Digital nhsdigital.fhir.r4.core.prototype# based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2019-12-13.
